previewArticle.title: LA Galaxy vs. Chivas USA | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: LA Galaxy 1, Chivas USA 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Los Angeles Galaxy vs. Chivas USA

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Attempt saved. Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Martin Rivero with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 10' Chivas goes on the break and isolates Barrera up field, but his shot is saved by Penedo. Gargan tracked back just enough to contest shot

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 10' Great pass from Rivero to Barrera who shoots on goal but Penedo gets to the ball first #LAvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Eric Avila (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Stefan Ishizaki with a through ball.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Gyasi Zardes is played through but can’t finish

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Dan Gargan gets tackled from behind and is slow to get up. Free Kick to the @LAGalaxy is taken short. 12’ #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: 9' @cdchivasusa looking sharp early with a shot from Barrera. Creating opportunities despite just one striker. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Avila clips Gargan in the back heel. Gargan gets back up gingerly after being down for a few moments. .

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Stefan Ishizaki with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: 12' Dan Gargan shaken up, but he seems ok. Cause we totally need more injuries at fullback. *knocks on wood* #LAGalaxy #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: Chivas finding so much space against this Galaxy defence, Barrera especially. Need to make it count though. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Burling comes late to bring down Zardes in the penalty area. LA wanted a penalty, but they won't get it from Marrufo.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Beautiful ball from Ishizaki puts Gyasi through on goal but the #LAGalaxy HGP can’t get anything on the shot. http://t.co/NMMipbd7wB #LAvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy).
Martin Rivero (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Tommy Meyer already starting to warm up. Gargan may be lifted after that late tackle by Avila. Not what Arena wanted early on. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: 14' Beautiful through ball into the box from @StefanIshizaki ... too bad Zardez completely missed the ball. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Interesting note. Tommy Meyer is getting warmed up. Talking with Assistant Coach Pat Noonan right now. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chivas USA. Tony Lochhead tries a through ball, but Erick Torres is caught offside.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Carlos Bocanegra (Chivas USA) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Jaime Penedo keeps Bocanegra off the score sheet

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by A.J. DeLaGarza.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Hey @cobijones, that bicycle kick back flip was a cannon ball. #LAGalaxy #LAvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Carlos Bocanegra (Chivas USA) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Mauro Rosales with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The@LAGalaxy have, so far, looked flat. Too many bad passes. Not on the same page. #LAGalaxy #MLS

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Jaime Penedo! What a save! #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Jaime Penedo just saved the #LAGalaxy from going down early. The defense is in disarray. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Rosales corner kick headed by Bocanegra of #ChivasUSA sharply but Penedo makes the save for #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 17' SAVE PENEDO. Bocanegra (I think) skirts past Gargan and launches a header that Penedo saves

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 18' Corner kick for #ChivasUSA. @BocaBoca3 with a header, but the ball is cleared by the Galaxy

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 0, Chivas USA 1. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Erick “Cubo” Torres makes some space and finishes

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: And we are under way at @StubHubCenter! Let's Go #LAGalaxy! #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy backline has had several fires to put out in this match. If we can get healthy, we'r a SS contendor. If not, Idt we make playoffs.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: "This is no rivalry" is the chant by the @ACBrigade as Landon Donovan makes a dangerous run through the Chivas defense.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: 20’ Landon Donovan streaks into the box before having his pass broken up. Landon showing why he needs to involved up top. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: 19' @landondonovan taking matters into his own hands. Turned on the afterburners with a long run at goal but was stuffed. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, LA Galaxy 1, Chivas USA 1.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Full Time: The #LAGalaxy are unable to break down a defensive @cdchivasusa. http://t.co/Nvt8opvNGj #LAvCHV http://t.co/Ol8P6jFdkn

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: And a goal kick. Hoffman for another chance. It's been that kind of day for #LAGalaxy.

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: Final: #ChivasUSA 1-1 #LAGalaxy #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: FT #LAGalaxy 1-1 #ChivasUSA Zardes gets a goal for the @LAGalaxy, but this is nothing but a failure for the Galaxy. World Cup Break. #MLS

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Full Time: The #LAGalaxy are unable to break down a defensive @cdchivasusa. http://t.co/Nvt8opvNGj #LAvCHV http://t.co/Ol8P6jFdkn

timelineItems.desc: The Los Angeles Galaxy and Chivas USA face off at the Stubhub Center in the season’s second SuperClasico.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: LA Galaxy vs. Chivas USA | June 8, 2014

timelineItems.name: A Galaxy Fan
timelineItems.text: Game time! #LAGalaxy #LAvCHV #SuperClasico

timelineItems.name: Andrew V Watson
timelineItems.text: From the away end...#ChivasUSA @cdchivasusa http://t.co/H1a5seHr3v

timelineItems.name: Andrew V Watson
timelineItems.text: From the away end...#ChivasUSA @cdchivasusa http://t.co/H1a5seHr3v

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Goal Chivas. “Cubo” Torres pounces on a turnover in the #LAGalaxy box to give the bad guys a 1-0 lead. http://t.co/NMMipbd7wB #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 20' GOAL CHIVAS USA! The Rojiblancos take the lead after an errant bounce off Leonardo falls for Cubo Torres. He punches it past Penedo.

timelineItems.name: Jonny Rico Aviles
timelineItems.text: Min 19 | GOAL! #ChivasUSA. Erick "Cubo" Torres. But a great pass from my Man of the Match so far Martin Rivero

timelineItems.name: Davin Lassiter
timelineItems.text: Chivas deserved that one. L.A. was unlucky to not clear though. Leonardo got a piece of it. Chivas came to play though. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Glancing Header
timelineItems.text: My last tweet is *already* out of date. That ChivasTBD goal has been coming for a while. Peñedo is gonna have a long afternoon. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: With the goal, Cubo Torres ties @cuauhtemocb10 for most @MLS goals by a Mexican born player with 16.

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: '20 Disaster. @erickestefano15 finishes from only a few feet out after Rivero found him among a crowd in the box. 1-0 Chivas USA #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Someone really has to explain to me why getting killed after a shot is a foul everywhere but in the attacking third. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: With the goal, Cubo Torres ties @cuauhtemocb10 for most @MLS goals by a Mexican striker with 16.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: This is the first time that @cdchivasusa have taken the lead in the SuperClasico since their last victory on May 19, 2012. #LAvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Sunday evening match between the LA Galaxy and Chivas USA. Will Landon Donovan keep rolling along against the Goats? Does Cubo Torres need a strike partner to be effective? Find out Sunday at 8pm ET on Univision Deportes.
timelineItems.title: LA Galaxy vs. Chivas USA June 8, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA attack looks the sharpest it has all season, especially MF Leandro Barrera, who sent the pass leading to Cubo goal

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Gyasi Zardes with a headed pass.
Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: How long ago was that lead? I was still covering Chivas USA for @MLS at the time. #Ages

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: Galaxy finding some space between backs and midfield and when they run at backs they have had some success. Something to watch #LAvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) header from the center of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Dan Kennedy with a HUGE double save

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Attempt saved. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner.
Attempt saved. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Foul by Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA).
A.J. DeLaGarza (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, LA Galaxy. Landon Donovan tries a through ball, but Gyasi Zardes is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Jonny Rico Aviles
timelineItems.text: What a great double save from #ChivasUSA GK Dan Kennedy I just witnessed! #LAGalaxy just can't get it in. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Zardes header (handball?), LD then fires a curling shot that Kennedy tipped off the post. Rebound falls for Sarvas but is saved. #Wow

timelineItems.name: Davin Lassiter
timelineItems.text: Kennedy earned his paycheck today already. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: ThreeForAWin
timelineItems.text: Looks like your #MLS save of the week all rolled into one, thanks to Dan Kennedy. Wicked shot by #LandonDonovan #LAGalaxy #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: 27' @landondonovan takes one of the nicest shots I've seen only to have it swatted into the post by GK Kennedy. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: .@MarceloSarvas has been folded twice in the opening minutes. The referee doesn’t seem interested. He threw his shoe in protest. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Dan @1DanKennedy makes his 124th career appearance to set a club record for #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chivas USA. Mauro Rosales tries a through ball, but Leandro Barrera is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: 27' @MarceloSarvas nearly finished it with a header but Kennedy didn't give up and stopped it Great play from the Chivas keeper. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 1, Chivas USA 1. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) header from the center of the box to the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Gyasi Zardes ties it up with a powerful header

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Zardes goal in the 35 minute. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Cubo Torres (@erickestefano15) finesses in @cdchivasusa's first of the match. WATCH: http://t.co/ltQ2EdAVTd #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: GOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAALLLLLLL GYASI ZARDES! 1-1! http://t.co/NMMipbd7wB #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 35' ZARDES GOAL! The LA Galaxy have tied it on a header from Gyasi Zardes off a fine cross by Marcelo Sarvas.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Ishiszaki to Sarvas who finds Zardes on the back post for the header goal. We’re all tied up. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: GYASI ZARDES! Ask and you shall recieve! The header off a Sarvas cross, and it is 1-1! #LAGalaxy #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: Beautiful display of teamwork there! Zardes heads it in there! From a slick cross by .@MarceloSarvas! #LAvCHV 1-1 35th min

timelineItems.name: Johnny Futbol
timelineItems.text: Zardes is at his best playing as a center forward. Hope Arenas keeps him up there. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: 34' GOAL! @gyasinho equalizes and gets #2 of the season on an unstoppable header! 1-1 #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Maren
timelineItems.text: Thank you Gyasi Zardes for saving us from the embarrassment of losing to Chivas USA #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Andrew Quasared S.
timelineItems.text: Zardes’ positioning has been on-point all night. You keep putting yourself in great spots like that, eventually it pays off. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Not one, but two highlight reel saves from @1DanKennedy. Check them out: http://t.co/Mg0BVjZjJV #LAvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Landon Donovan.
Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: "Waiting for the final goodbye" - @acbrigade tifo for #LAvCHV #MLS http://t.co/jUhFq6kg2W

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: "Waiting for the final goodbye" - @acbrigade tifo for #LAvCHV #MLS http://t.co/jUhFq6kg2W

timelineItems.name: Fake JP Dellacamera
timelineItems.text: Dan Kennedy should win the MLS Humanitarian of the Year Award. Nobody is more deserving. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Francisco X. Rivera
timelineItems.text: Gyasi Zardes scored his 2nd goal of the season on his 11th shot. He scored 4 on 83 shots in 2013. #LAGalaxy #LAvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Landon Donovan.
Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: “Look at those hops.” -Landon Donovan #LAvCHV http://t.co/0fA8aGaF0i

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: “Look at those hops.” -Landon Donovan #LAvCHV http://t.co/0fA8aGaF0i

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Rogers holding his right rib area after that challenge in the attacking third. Still a little concerned with it as play continues. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Landon Donovan.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Lando to Ishi, Ishi with a couple of moves looks for Landon at the back post but LD stopped his run. It would have been easy. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 45' #LAGalaxy starting to find first gear since the goal, but they've yet to test Kennedy since Zardes' strike. Final touch lacking a bit.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy taking lots more shots. Not quality chances, but keeping Chivas and Kennedy on their toes. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Zardes header to Ishizaki was perfect. The return pass to Zardes, perfect. Everything after that was horrible. #45Minute #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Notty Test
timelineItems.text: 44: Another shot off the mark by #LAG, that's their 3rd of the match. #losangeles 0 - 0 #chivasusa

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Juninho (LA Galaxy).
Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: HT #LAGalaxy 1-1 #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: Man of the match so far. Doubt anyone questions it is: Dan Kennedy. Remarkable. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Notty Test
timelineItems.text: 47: Referee Marrufo blows the whistle to end the first half. #losangeles 0 - 0 #chivasusa

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: HT - 1-1. #LAGalaxy starting to look better since Zardes goal, but there's still more to be done. Chivas seem to have given up the attack

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, LA Galaxy 1, Chivas USA 1.

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: HALF! 1-1 @LAGalaxy started a bit slow but took over about midway through the half. Second half will be interesting. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: WATCH: @gyasinho ties it up off a beautiful header: http://t.co/Uy96vkdXxs #LAvCHV http://t.co/lotLyLY5Vt

timelineItems.name: Glancing Header
timelineItems.text: “@Scatterfelt: Isn’t that twice Rogers has stopped on a dime and sent Rosales toppling over?#LAvCHV” You are correct https://t.co/l0SvbRnuNo

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: WATCH: @gyasinho ties it up off a beautiful header: http://t.co/Uy96vkdXxs #LAvCHV http://t.co/lotLyLY5Vt

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins LA Galaxy 1, Chivas USA 1.

timelineItems.name: Notty Test
timelineItems.text: Referee Marrufo starts the second half. And the teams are level at the start of the half. #losangeles 0 - 0 #chivasusa

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: 2nd half underway for #LAGalaxy vs. #ChivasUSA. No subs yet

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: We’re back for the second half. Watch now on @TWCSportsNet or @UnivisionSports: http://t.co/Nvt8opvNGj #LAvCHV http://t.co/OHf0kpxC98

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: We’re back for the second half. Watch now on @TWCSportsNet or @UnivisionSports: http://t.co/Nvt8opvNGj #LAvCHV http://t.co/OHf0kpxC98

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: @gyasinho levels the match with a towering header: http://t.co/XjVgVGWs04 #LAvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) header from the center of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Stefan Ishizaki's header is blocked

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The @LAGalaxy looking to start this half like they finished the last. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: The action's underway here at @StubHubCenter -- what are your predictions for today!? #LAvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Robbie Rogers with a cross.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Carlos Bocanegra.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: The #LAGalaxy and Chivas resume play as the Galaxy subs all get up on the sideline.

timelineItems.name: LAGConfidential
timelineItems.text: Samuel is sitting there mashing on the right stick when he shouda just sent in the hopeful ball #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: Second half here at a tied Cali El Classico is underway! A tied 1-1 has the crowd pumped! #LAvCHV http://t.co/U50zp0RtcQ

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: Second half here at a tied Cali El Classico is underway! A tied 1-1 has the crowd pumped! #LAvCHV http://t.co/U50zp0RtcQ

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Mauro Rosales.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: And Samuel misses a chance at his feet to score. #LAGalaxy #LAvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left following a corner.
Attempt missed. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Robbie Rogers following a corner.
Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Rogers makes a great tackle and the referee waits for about 10 minutes before sheepishly calling the foul. That didn’t look great. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Ever since the formation change, Rogers has neutralized Rosales on the #LAGalaxy's left side. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Kennedy with another save, this time on Donovan. The #LAGalaxy are knocking on the door to start the second half: http://t.co/Nvt8opvNGj

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Robbie Rogers.
Offside, LA Galaxy. Stefan Ishizaki tries a through ball, but Gyasi Zardes is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: "The Goats are dead. No one cares." - @LARiotSquad tifo. #LAvCHV http://t.co/RHwo6MCqNL

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: "The Goats are dead. No one cares." - @LARiotSquad tifo. #LAvCHV http://t.co/RHwo6MCqNL

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 55' LD is currently playing up top with Samuel. Zardes and Ishizaki playing wide for #LAGalaxy.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Samuel Rosa (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the left side of the box is just a bit too high.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Samuel Rosa turns and fires over the bar

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Samuel Rosa (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the left side of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Gyasi Zardes with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Mike Gray
timelineItems.text: Penedo's distribution has been poor tonight. @LAGalaxy #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: OFF FRAME. Samuel gets the ball in a dangerous area off a Zardes header, but his shot sails away from Kennedy's net.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Ishizaki a long pointed cross to the back post for Zardes who heads it back to Samuel. He skies it over, but it looked pretty. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Agustín Pelletieri.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Great play by Zardes making something out of nothing. Samuel can't finish the volley off the header. Would have been a golaso. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 59' Shot from outside of the box by Barrera; ball goes high above the crossbar #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Opportunity for Rogers to solidify a place on the left side of defense for the #LAGalaxy. Could allow AJ to return to CB permanently.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: So far it’s been Gyasi up top with Samuel. Landon is playing distributor. A lot of late runs down the left side by Rogers. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Stefan Ishizaki.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 61' Assistant coach Pat Noonan giving the marching orders to Rob Friend. I'd expect that he's coming in for Samuel.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The @LAGalaxy really starting to link play together in the final third. Chivas is just kicking the ball long. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Eric Avila (Chivas USA).
Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Lots of possession, no scoring chances though. 30 minutes left for the Gs to get another. #LAGalaxy #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Ron Waxman
timelineItems.text: Have #ChivasUSA touched the ball in the second half? #LAvCHV #SuperClasico

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: 63rd minute. #LAGalaxy with a free kick opportunity from about 30 yards out. Shot or Cross? Ishi, LD, Juninho over it.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Another free kick chance for #LAGalaxy. Must get a chance here.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Juninho's blast goes right into the wall. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: ChivaUSA Fighter
timelineItems.text: Saves or saves of the week! “@MLS: Not one, but two highlight reel saves from @1DanKennedy. Check them out: http://t.co/BKNHU3fmhI #LAvCHV”

timelineItems.name: ThreeForAWin
timelineItems.text: Getting to be that time when Bruce makes his subs for the sake of making subs and he just subs position for position. #LAGalaxy #LAvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Robbie Rogers with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Black Landon
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy are so frustrating to watch #LAvCHV #LAvsCHV

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Dan Gargan and Erick Torres are having some words after the play. Gargan was fouled hard after the play. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: 19,756 is tonights announced attendance. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 69' First sub for #ChivasUSA | Primer cambio para #ChivasUSA: Tyrpak in for Barrera #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Robbie Rogers able to make a tackle in the box to keep Torres from getting to the cross. Chivas good on the counter. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Zardes and Samuel paired up top for LA while LD is currently in the slot playing a distributor role at the moment. Sarvas/Ishi wide.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Penedo has been great since coming to the Galaxy, but the quickness of his decision making still worries me. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Arena goes to his bench. Big Rob Friend checks in for Samuel. Can he come up with an equalizer? http://t.co/NMMipbd7wB #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Ron Waxman
timelineItems.text: I understand #ChivasUSA putting everyone behind the ball. Can't argue with trying to grind out a point on the road. #LAvCHV #SuperClasico

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 69' Samuel giving way for Rob Friend. Solid game for the Brazilian. Fourth official initially had Sarvas' number on the board.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Rob Friend is on for Samuel in the 69th minute. The @LAGalaxy need to find a goal. #LAGalaxy #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Round 2: Gargan vs Torres Gargan takes out the Chivas striker. No foul and they continue to loathe one another. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 71' Rosales sends in a ball to Tyrpak, but the Rookie doesn't connect with the ball. 1-1 #LAvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Galaxy lacking some final third passing. Need to find a way past this Chivas defense. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Not getting 3 points out of this game would be a disaster for the @LAGalaxy. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Andrew Martonik
timelineItems.text: These announcers consistently mispronounce "Rosales." At least choose one wrong way to say it. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Ishizaki down on the field after being clipped by Pelleteri on his follow through. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Rob Friend (LA Galaxy) header from the center of the box is just a bit too high.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Rob Friend heads over from a long throw

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: 74' Ishizaki down with a knock. Dribbled through 3 players 45 seconds ago and went down after contact. PLEASE BE OK #LAGalaxy #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Marky Delgado now comes in for Mauro Rosales for #ChivasUSA. Still 1-1 with #LAGalaxy, 75th minute

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Rob Friend (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Dan Gargan.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Dan Gargan with the long throw, finds Friend bracketed by 2 defenders. Friend able to get a shot toward goal, but over. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: 75' Chivas sub. Rosales out. Delgado in. Rosales was Chivas's best attacker other than Torres on the field. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Chandler Hoffman preparing to come for the #LAGalaxy.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Rob Friend with a header, but it goes over the bar. #LAGalaxy #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 75' The #LAGalaxy are starting look frustrated on the field. Not getting three points against Chivas is tantamount to failure for the club.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Just over the bar from Friend! Chivas USA were almost put in the #FriendZone but the Canadian couldn’t keep his header on frame. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: LAGConfidential
timelineItems.text: Don't hassle this hoff! “@LAGalaxyInsider: Chandler Hoffman preparing to come for the #LAGalaxy.”

timelineItems.name: Sam
timelineItems.text: Confused why Chivas would sub off Rosales... is Torres next? #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Chandler Hoffman checks in for Marcelo Sarvas. Hoffman is making his Galaxy debut in MLS play...464 days since he was acquired. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Chandler Hoffman replacing Marcelo Sarvas for #LAGalaxy. Let's see if he brings his Galaxy II scoring touch with him

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Juninho has a crack from distance

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Juninho (LA Galaxy).
Martin Rivero (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Eric Avila (Chivas USA).
Samuel Rosa (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt saved. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Landon Donovan.
Offside, Chivas USA. Erick Torres tries a through ball, but Kristopher Tyrpak is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Juninho looking to zero in on the goal. 10 minutes left for the @LAGAalxy to find a winner. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Juninho from distance, Kennedy gives up a rebound, but snags it. #LAGalaxy #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: This game has gotten a lot more stretched in the last 10 minutes. Both teams asking questions. #LAGalaxy #LAvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Rob Friend (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Robbie Rogers with a cross.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Leonardo.
Attempt missed. Eric Avila (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is too high following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: I don’t know where the goal is going to come from. It could just as easily be scored by a counter-attacking Chivas. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 84' Husidic comes in for Ishizaki. Likely Arena is looking for a little passing discipline to connect with Friend/Hoffman.

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Stefan Ishizaki now gives way to Baggio Husidic for #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Bruce goes to the bench one last time. Stefan Ishizaki will make way for Baggio Husidic. Five minutes left to find a winner. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: LAGConfidential
timelineItems.text: Friend's the only sub that really changed the way the #lagalaxy style. It's been the cross parade since he came in

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: 85' Last sub for #LAGalaxy. Husidic in for Ishizaki. Fresh legs for the Galaxy. Need to push here. They've had chances, match up for grabs.

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: Leaving for LA is Ishizaki... on for him is #6 Husidic. Fresh legs. Or so one hopes. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Chivas stalling like their getting re-branded during this game. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Andrew Quasared S.
timelineItems.text: Going wide and crossing in hasn’t been working for LA. I bet Husidic is in with instructions to keep passes short and quick. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Chivas appears content to get a draw. #LAGalaxy need a goal. Would be disappointed to not get three points today. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Chandler Hoffman (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Rob F
timelineItems.title: MISS: Chandler Hoffman can’t find the winner

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Torres just brought down Gargan who is down on the ground. Looks like it may be a head injury. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Leandro Barrera gets a low effort on goal

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: “Waiting for the final goodbye” #LAvCHV http://t.co/YZsgeBeSct

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: “Waiting for the final goodbye” #LAvCHV http://t.co/YZsgeBeSct

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The free kick is launched into the box. Several @LAGalaxy with a chance for a touch. But Kennedy scoops it up harmlessly. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Chandler Hoffman (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Rob Friend.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: 90th minute. Chandler Hoffman almost brought the roof down. He just missed that right footed strike to the back post. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: WIDE! Friend knocks it down for Hoffman, but his attempt sails just wide of Kennedy's net. Close there by @chandala

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Four minutes of added time. #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: Well that was almost the winner. Would have been a delight to see Hoffman get that one in the net! #LAvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Chandler Hoffman (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from very close range is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Gyasi Zardes.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: LA scrambles for the winner but comes up empty

timelineItems.name: Davin Lassiter
timelineItems.text: How does a player cover that much ground in the opposite direction, and it doesn't seem like anyone even tried to show for him? #LAvCHV

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Seconds left. A throw in for #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Chandler Hoffman (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Gyasi Zardes.
Attempt missed. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the left side of the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA survives a late flurry in front of #ChivasUSA goalkeeper Dan Kennedy

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, LA Galaxy 1, Chivas USA 1.
